quests.name: Burying the Eel
objectives: Talk to Goofy.

Gather the following items:
  ‧ 3 Worms
  ‧ 8 Softwood
Craft a Fishing Trap.
Place the Fishing Trap near the dock on Dazzle Beach.
Talk to Maui.
Catch an Eel attracted by the bait in the Fishing Trap.
Bring the Eel to Maui.
Bury the Eel at the Beach.
Tend to the crop until it grows into a Coconut Tree.
Harvest the Coconut from the new Coconut Tree.
Bring the Coconut to Maui.
rewards: Coconut Trees spawn on Dazzle Beach

quests.name: A Tale of Stone and Fire
objectives: Follow Maui to Dazzle Beach.
Talk to Maui.
Gather the 5 items needed for Maui from his basket in the Moana Realm.
Bring Maui the items you gathered.
Cook a fresh 5-star meal for Maui.
Make sure you have a 5-star meal in your Inventory.
Bring the meal you cooked to Maui.
Follow Maui back to the sea debris.
Break the sea debris and collect what you find inside.
Show Maui what you found.

Gather the following items to craft a Granite Fire Bowl:
  ‧ 20 Sand
  ‧ 25 Stone
  ‧ 10 Coal Ore
  ‧ 3 Red Falling Penstemon
Craft a Granite Fire Bowl.
Place the Granite Fire Bowl in the Village.
Return to talk to Maui.

quests.name: Demigod of the Wind and Sun
objectives:
Gather the follow items to craft some Kites:
  ‧ 18 Softwood
  ‧ 30 Fiber
Craft 3 Kite
Show the Kites to Maui.

Bring a Kite to:
  ‧ Goofy.
  ‧ Merlin.
  ‧ WALL-E.
Go back to Maui.
Follow Maui to the location of the Missing Island.
Talk to Maui.
Fish where the island used to be.
Bring Maui what you've found.

quests.name: The Heart of Dreamlight Valley
objectives: Clear the crust off the Limestone at your Crafting Station.
Show the Shard you found to Maui.
Get to the Fountain at the top of the Castle.
Look for the missing Piece of the Heart of Dreamlight Valley
Talk to Maui
Talk to Merlin

Gather the following ingredients to fix the Heart of Dreamlight Valley:
  ‧ 3 Purified Night Shard
  ‧ Water from the Forgotten Lands
  ‧ Water from the Frosted Heights
Make the Heart of Dreamlight Valley whole again at your Crafting Station.
Bring the Heart of Dreamlight Valley to Maui.
Place the Heart of Dreamlight Valley in the hand of the Statue in the Castle.
Talk to Maui

quests.name: Training Games: The Shapeshifter
objectives: Talk to Maui.

Gather the items from Maui's clue:
  ‧ Maui's Frozen Flag.
  ‧ Mint.
  ‧ Ginger.
  ‧ 2 Carrot.
Find a way to combine the Mini Flag with the gathered Ingredients.
Make sure you have Maui's Flag in your Inventory.
Bring Maui's Flag to Maui.
